main event: On August 7, 1952, an unidentified object was observed over Detroit, Michigan, with significant features like changing colors and unusual movement.
interesting points: The object was the size of a large star and changed colors from white to red intermittently., The sighting lasted approximately 30 minutes., Two jets were reported in the vicinity during the observation., The object remained stationary for a significant portion of the sighting before moving out of sight., Witnesses included a grade school teacher and other unidentified individuals.
sighted object: a large, bright, round, silver object that changed color and appeared to hover
witness description: The main witness was a 57-year-old male grade school teacher, and several others also observed the event.
